00051     function __construct( $sBaseUrl, $sAppName, $sAppId, $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret = "", $sProfileId = "" )
00052     {

00059         $this->m_sServerUrl = $sBaseUrl . $sAppName . "/";
00060     }

00069     {

00071         {
00072             case "RefPFUserId":
00073                 $this->m_sRefPFUserId = $oValue;
00074                 break;
00075 
00076             case "UserDB":

00086                 break;
00087

00089                 $this->m_sNSPrefix = $oValue;
00090                 break;
00091         }

00157     /***
00158     *@desc Have a looksee at the query string...
00159     */
00160     public function processQueryString()
00161     {
00162         $this->m_sRefPFUserId = null;
00163 
00164         if ( isset( $_REQUEST['refuid'] ) )
00165             $this->m_sRefPFUserId = $_REQUEST[ 'refuid' ];
00166     }

00168     /***
00169     *@desc Generic redirect
00170     */
00171     public function redirect( $sUrl = null )
00172     {
00173         try
00174         {
00175             if ( null != $this->m_oPFAPI && null != $sUrl )
00176                 $this->m_oPFAPI->redirect( $sUrl );
00177         }
00178         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00179         {
00180             //  Totally ignore error if not supported...
00181         }
00182     }

00190     protected function getDashboardFBML( $sPrefix, $arDashPoints )
00191     {
00192         $sOut = "<$sPrefix:dashboard>";
00193 
00194         foreach ( $arDashPoints as $oPName => $oPoint )
00195         {
00196             $sOut .= "<$sPrefix:" . $oPoint[ 'type' ] . " href=\"" . $oPoint[ 'url' ] . "\">" . $oPoint[ 'name' ] . "</$sPrefix:" . $oPoint[ 'type' ] . ">";
00197         }
00198 
00199         $sOut .= "</$sPrefix:dashboard>";
00200 
00201         return( $sOut );
00202     }

00274     public function validateUser( $bRequireFrame = true, $bRequireAdd = true, $bRequireLogin = false, $bUsePrefs = true, $bAddUser = true )
00275     {
00276         $sPref = null;
00277 
00278         if ( $bRequireFrame )
00279             $this->requireFrame();
00280 
00281         if ( $bRequireAdd )
00282             $this->requireAdd();
00283 
00284         if ( $bRequireLogin )
00285             $this->requireLogin();
00286 
00287         if ( $bUsePrefs )
00288         {
00289             //  Try and get prior hash uid...
00290             $sPref = $this->getUserData( SF_Preferences::HashUID );
00291 
00292             //  Doesn't exist?
00293             if ( $sPref == null || $sPref == "" )
00294             {
00295                 try
00296                 {
00297                     //  Get data from server...
00298                     $arDemoData = $this->getUserInfo();
00299 
00300                     //  Set the demo data...
00301                     $this->m_oSntx->setDemoData( SF_Helpers::array_to_string( $arDemoData ) );
00302 
00303                     //  Store with client
00304                     $this->setUserData( SF_Preferences::HashUID, $this->m_oSntx->getHashUID() );
00305                 }
00306                 catch ( Exception $_ex )
00307                 {
00308                     //  Unknown
00309                     $this->m_oSntx->setHashUID( 0 );
00310                 }
00311             }
00312             else
00313                 $this->m_oSntx->setHashUID( intval($sPref) );
00314 
00315             $this->setUserData( SF_Preferences::HashUID, $this->m_oSntx->getHashUID() );
00316         }
00317 
00318         //  Save session key...
00319         $sPFSessionKey = $this->getSessionKey();
00320 
00321         //  Add the user...
00322         if ( $this->m_oUserDB )
00323         {
00324             if ( $bAddUser || ( isset( $_REQUEST['installed'] ) && $_REQUEST['installed'] == '1' ) )
00325             {
00326                 $_sFirst = '';
00327                 $_sLast = '';
00328 
00329                 try
00330                 {
00331                     $_rs = $this->execPFSQL( "select first_name, last_name from user where uid = " . $this->m_sPFUserId );
00332                     if ( $_rs )
00333                     {
00334                         $_sFirst = $_rs[ 0 ][ 'first_name' ];
00335                         $_sLast = $_rs[ 0 ][ 'last_name' ];
00336                     }
00337                 }
00338                 catch ( Exception $_ex )
00339                 {
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 //  Is user in not the database? Add him...
00343                 if ( ! $this->m_oUserDB->userIsInDB( $this->m_sPFUserId ) )
00344                     $this->m_oUserDB->addNewUser( $this->m_sPFUserId, $sPFSessionKey, $this->m_sRefPFUserId, true, $_sFirst, $_sLast );
00345                 elseif ( isset( $_REQUEST['installed'] ) && $_REQUEST['installed'] == '1' )
00346                     $this->m_oUserDB->addOldUser( $this->m_sPFUserId, $sPFSessionKey, $_sFirst, $_sLast );
00347                 else
00348                 {
00349                     if ( method_exists( $this->m_oUserDB, "touchUser" ) )
00350                         $this->m_oUserDB->touchUser( $this->m_sPFUserId, $sPFSessionKey, $_sFirst, $_sLast );
00351                 }
00352             }
00353             else
00354             {
00355                 try
00356                 {
00357                     if ( method_exists( $this->m_oUserDB, "touchUser" ) )
00358                     {
00359                         $this->m_oUserDB->touchUser( $this->m_sPFUserId, $sPFSessionKey );
00360                     }
00361                 }
00362                 catch ( Exception $_ex )
00363                 {
00364                     error_log( "Error touching user: " . $_ex->getMessage(), 0 );
00365                 }
00366             }
00367 
00368             //  Store the referrer...
00369             if ( $this->m_sRefPFUserId != null )
00370                 $this->UserDB->storeReferrer( $this->m_sPFUserId, $this->m_sRefPFUserId );
00371         }
00372     }

00456     public function loadInvitePage( $sInviteText, $sInviteLabel, &$sInviteFBML, &$arFriends, $sExtraParms = null )
00457     {
00458         $iCount = 0;
00459 
00460         $sIDList = $this->m_oSntx->user_getInvitees();
00461         $sAction = "";
00462 
00463         $rs = $this->execPFSQL( "SELECT uid FROM user WHERE has_added_app = 1 and uid IN (SELECT uid2 FROM friend WHERE uid1 = " . $this->PFUserId . " )" );
00464 
00465         $arFriends = "";
00466 
00467         if ( $rs && is_array( $rs ) )
00468         {
00469             for ( $i = 0; $i < count($rs); $i++ )
00470             {
00471                 if ( $arFriends != "" )
00472                     $arFriends .= ",";
00473 
00474                 $arFriends .= $rs[ $i ]['uid'];
00475 
00476                 $iCount++;
00477             }
00478         }
00479 
00480         //  Append already invited folks...
00481         if ( $sIDList != "" )
00482             $arFriends .= "," . trim($sIDList);
00483 
00484         $sNextUrl = "&refuid=" . $this->PFUserId;
00485         if ( $sExtraParms != null )
00486             $sNextUrl .= $sExtraParms;
00487 
00488         $sAddAppUrl = $this->getAddAppUrl( $sNextUrl );
00489 
00490         $sInviteFBML = $this->getInviteContent( $sInviteText, $sInviteLabel, $sAddAppUrl );
00491 
00492         return( $sNextUrl );
00493     }
00494 
00495     public function getInviteContent( $sInviteText, $sInviteLabel, $sAddAppUrl )
00496     {
00497         $sInviteFBML = <<<FBML
00498 <{$this->m_sNSPrefix}:name uid="{$this->PFUserId}" firstnameonly="true" shownetwork="false"/>$sInviteText
00499 <{$this->m_sNSPrefix}:req-choice url="{$sAddAppUrl}" label="$sInviteLabel" />
00500 FBML;
00501 
00502         return( $sInviteFBML );
00503     }

00505     /***
00506     *@desc Creates an xx:EDITOR custom select box. RS must be in 0 = ID, 1 = Label format
00507     */
00508     public static function getMLEditorSelect( $sLabel, $sName, $oRS, $iDefault, $sNSPrefix = "fb" )
00509     {
00510         $sOut = "";
00511 
00512         $sOut .= "<{$sNSPrefix}:editor-custom label=\"{$sLabel}\">";
00513         $sOut .= "<select name=\"{$sName}\">";
00514 
00515         while ( $row = mysql_fetch_array( $oRS ) )
00516         {
00517             $sOut .= "<option value=\"{$row[0]}\"";
00518             if ( $row[ 0 ] == $iDefault )
00519                 $sOut .= " selected ";
00520             $sOut .= ">" . $row[1] . "</option>";
00521         }
00522 
00523         $sOut .= "</select>";
00524         $sOut .= "</{$sNSPrefix}:editor-custom>";
00525 
00526         return( $sOut );
00527     }
00528 
00529     /***
00530     *@desc Creates an xx:EDITOR custom select box. RS must be in 0 = ID, 1 = Label format
00531     */
00532     public static function getCodeSelectList( $oDB, $sLabel, $sName, $sCodeType, $iDefault, $sNSPrefix = "fb" )
00533     {
00534         $rs = $oDB->getRecordset( "select code_uid, code_desc_text from pspan_code_t where code_type_text = '" . strtoupper( $sCodeType ) . "' order by 2", false );
00535         return( SF_Platform::getMLEditorSelect( $sLabel, $sName, $rs, $iDefault, $sNSPrefix ) );
00536     }
